title: Drawing, "Still Life with Fruits in a Basket, Wallpaper Design", 1935–50
medium: Brush and coral, pink, and beige gouache, graphite on cream paper
signed: Signed in graphite, lower right corner:  Parzinger
description: A tall, woven basket filled with oranges, pears, grapes, and apples rests on grass.  Below the basket are, reading left to right, a cherry, melon, and rear part of a hen (cut off at the lower right).  A dragonfly is above the fruit basket.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Still Life with Fruits in a Basket, Wallpaper Design", 1935–50.
1935–50. Brush and coral, pink, and beige gouache, graphite on cream paper. Gift of Donald Cameron. 1998-19-126.
